about_the_game:
BeeFriend is a cozy simulation game where you care for your own honey bees and expand your apiary! Build hives, harvest honey, and create a buzzing haven. Grow your beekeeping business from a backyard hobby to a household name. Immerse yourself in the joy of beekeeping as you nurture your colonies, observe your bees, and enjoy the peaceful rhythms of life as a beekeeper!


  • Realtime Honey Bee Colony Simulation
  • Diverse Flower Ecosystem
  • Beekeeping Business Management
  • Interactive Honey Extraction & Bottling System
  • Realistic Disease System
  • Weather system that affects honey production
  • Variety of honey types and flower combinations
  • Farmers market to sell bee products
  • Designed by honey bees

Join our discord!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor/Ryzen 1600+

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+

short_description: BeeFriend is a cozy simulation game where you tend to honey bees and expand your apiary. Build hives, gather honey, and create a thriving bee haven. Turn your beekeeping hobby into a famous enterprise. Enjoy nurturing your colonies, observing bees, and the peaceful life of a beekeeper.
